Headline: #66 Chicago Temporary Reroute near Michigan/Hubbard, due to street blockage.
ShortDescription: 66 Chicago buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions near Michigan/Hubbard, due to street blockage.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#66 Chicago buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions near Michigan/Hubbard, due to street blockage.

Northbound buses will operate via Michigan, Wacker, State, Ohio, then resume their normal route on Michigan.

Southbound buses will operate via Michigan, Ontario, State, Wacker, then resume their normal route on Michigan.

Allow extra travel time.
